title: Sword of Occult and Mejai Should not be removed
body: RIOT! you go too far this update. Occult and Mejai are fun Items with some new special build for many players. It doesnt snowball the game if other team know how to focus you. Please dont remove Occult and Mejai. Any fan of Occult and Mejai please talk.

replies.body: Please don't build it lol. Rare exceptions that it may be possibly okay is if you're like smurphing on a support that is nearly unkillable but I really don't condone that either lol.

**_I'm not near the game design / balance areas of Riot_**

Just wanted to point out that Mejai's is still in in the game - and infact is actually easy / stronger to build early thanks to Dark Seal making it easier to get started, earlier to get the stacks [literally 0:00 into the game] and the final item is faster to buy due to increased gold incomes.

Also, for most characters the full-stack passive is significantly stronger now too.
